pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with House Representatives in Washington, D.C. | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi and a number of Representatives today in Washington, D.C.

The Prime Minister and the Representatives discussed a number of priority issues including border security, refugees, cross border water and environment management, arctic cooperation, climate change, and trade relations.

They agreed on the importance of continued strong relations for the benefit of citizens on both sides of the border.
